abstract: City officials confirm that senior members of Mayor Bill de Blasio's administration will receive raises of about 6 percent over next three years.
lead_paragraph: The senior-most members of Mayor Bill de Blasio’s administration will receive about a 6 percent raise over the next three years, city officials said.
snippet: The senior-most members of Mayor Bill de Blasio’s administration will receive about a 6 percent raise over the next three years, city officials said.

headline.main: Higher Pay for New York City’s Managers
